text:
Switzerland, Zurich | ONSITE | swissQuant | Java Developer Private Wealth Technologies | Full-time (remote possible for 1-2 days per week)

Quant Developers use their skills and experience across technology and finance to create industry leading software components for portfolio construction, risk management and private client advisory. Salaries are in the range of 8000 - 11.000 CHF / month after taxes

Needed skills / interest:

- Knowledge or interest in finance

- Java stack

More info:

http://www.swissquant.com/de/775/Offene-Stellen.htm?Job=2350... (Job-ad is written by HR, so sorry)

Write us a mail, if you want to apply: iwang@fastmail.net
